data.question: There is a death-note in front of you. What will you do ?
Where do you want to go now ?
The death note says, if you write anyone's name on it, the mentioned person shall die of an heart attack.
People are dying of heart attacks without any plausible reason. L has requested you to investigate this singularity. What will you do ?
It seems as though the unexpected deaths happen after school hours. What will you do ?
You are in school right now. You find Lite Yagami to be writing something in a very rusty notebook. What will you do ?
data.left_option: Ask Lite Yagami about what he is writing.
data.right_option: Sneak up from behind and observe what he is writing.
